Name: More Dice!
Description: Roll a dice!|Take <d6> damage
Script: On Execute: //$ var value = rand([1|2|3|4|5|6]); givedice(value); pierceattackself(value);  e.resetskillsfornewturn();$

Name: Blood Battery
Description: Your next equipment is reusable[;]|take [sword]<var:hurtself> damage

Name: Loyal Protector
Description: Convert all but 1|of your health to shield

Name: Loyal Protector_upgraded
Description: Convert all but 1|of your health to|twice as much shield

Name: Shield Smash
Description: Spend [shield]<d6> shield[;]|deal [sword]<double> damage
Script: On Execute: if (getstatusself(SHIELD) <= d) { attack(getstatusself(SHIELD) * 2); attackself(getstatusself(SHIELD)); } else { attack(d * 2); attackself(d); }

Name: Infinite Hall
Description: Roll infinite dice!|-1 dice this fight

Name: Unmarked Dice
Description: Gain +1 dice this fight[;]|it's always blinded

Name: Heavily Loaded Dice
Description: You only roll <d6>[;]|-1 dice this fight
Script: On Execute: self.extradice--; if (getstatusself(~heavyloaded_~ + self.getvar(~load~)) > 0) { removestatusself(~heavilyloaded_~ + self.getvar(~load~)); } inflictself(~heavyloaded_~ + d); self.setvar(~load~|d);
Script: On Start Turn: if (getstatusself(~heavyloaded_~ + self.getvar(~load~)) > 0) { for (mydice in self.dicepool){ if (mydice.available()) { if (mydice.basevalue != self.getvar(~load~)) { mydice.animatereroll(self.getvar(~load~)); } } } }

Name: Band Saw
Description: Split a dice[;]|the dice stays split
Script: On Start Turn: if (getstatusself(~split~) > 0) { var split = getstatusself(~split~); for (mydice in self.dicepool){ if (mydice.available()) { if (split > 0) { givedice(split(mydice.basevalue)| ~splitdice~); split--; } } } }

Name: Bump Two Much
Description: Take [heart]2 damage[;]|bump dice[;] twice
Script: On Execute: var dicelist = []; pierceattackself(2); if(d >= 6) { givedice([6| 1]);  } else { givedice(d + 1); } for (mydice in self.dicepool) { if (mydice.available()) { trace(mydice); trace(mydice.basevalue); dicelist.push(mydice); } } trace(dicelist[dicelist.length]); trace(dicelist[dicelist.length].basevalue); trace(dicelist[dicelist.length-1]); trace(dicelist[dicelist.length-1].basevalue); if (dicelist[dicelist.length - 1].basevalue >= 6) { givedice(1); } else { dicelist[dicelist.length - 1].animatereroll(dicelist[dicelist.length - 1] + 1); }

Name: Caught Cheating
Description: Roll 6 <d6>[;] you can|no longer roll <d6> for the rest of the fight
Script: On Start Turn: var i = 1; var acceptable = []; var banned = []; var banall = false; for (i in 1...7) { if (getstatusself(~dicelock_~ + i) > 0) { banned.push(i); } else { acceptable.push(i); } } if (acceptable.length < 1) { banall = true; } i = 1; for (mydice in self.dicepool){ if (mydice.available()) { for (i in banned) { if (mydice.basevalue == i) { if (banall == true) { mydice.removedice(self.screenposition()); } else { mydice.animatereroll(rand(acceptable)); } } } i = 1; } }

Name: Dice Loan
Description: Roll 3 dice|Next turn[;] lock [lock]2

Name: Dice Loan_upgraded
Description: Roll <d6>+1 dice|Next turn[;] lock [lock]<d6>
Script: On Execute: var i = 0; for (i in 0...d+1) { givedice(rand([1|2|3|4|5|6])); if (i > 0) { inflictself(~block~|d); } }

Name: Blood Crucible
Description: Siphon [heart]3 health to your|opponent[;] roll 2 dice

Name: Blood Crucible_upgraded
Description: Siphon [heart]<d6> health to your|opponent[;] roll 2 dice

Name: Dice Drain
Description: Roll 2 dice[;]|Next turn[;] freeze [ice]2 dice

Name: Bloodier Cauldron
Description: Take <double> damage[;]|roll 2 dice

Name: Bloodier Cauldron_upgraded
Description: Take <double> damage[;]|roll <d6> dice
Script: On Execute: var i = 0; pierceattackself(d*2); for (i in 0...d) { givedice(rand([1|2|3|4|5|6])); }

Name: Dice Theft
Description: Steal 3 dice from|your opponent
Script: On Execute: if (target.dice + target.extradice < 3) { var i = 0; for (i in 0...target.dice+target.extradice) { givedice(); target.extradice--; inflict(~stolen~|1); } } else { givedice([rand([1|2|3|4|5|6])|rand([1|2|3|4|5|6])|rand([1|2|3|4|5|6])]); target.extradice-=3; inflict(~stolen~|3); }

Name: Borrowed Time
Description: Heal to [heal]full|Take [poison]15 poison

Name: Borrowed Time_upgraded
Description: Heal to [heal]full|Take [poison]10 poison

Name: Pain Split
Description: Split both of your health|between the two of you
Script: On Execute: var total = ((self.hp + target.hp) / 2); pierceattackself(self.hp - total); pierceattack(target.hp - total);

Name: Eternal Life
Description: Increase max hp by 4[;] finish|the fight in two turns or die|[gray](Disappears in <var:turns> turns!)

Name: Eternal Life@activated
Description: Be careful what|you wish for…

Name: Vampirism
Description: Your next attack drains health|instead of dealing damage

Name: Emergency Vampire Blood
Description: If you're in critical health[;]|survive all fatal attacks until your next turn

Name: From the Brink
Description: Heal to [heal]full[;] only|works at critical health|[gray](Breaks after use)

Name: God's Gift
Description: Heal for half the damage you|dealt to yourself last turn

Name: Vengeful Strike
Description: Do [sword]<var:hurt> damage|[gray](Equal to health lost)

Name: Only in Death
Description: Do [sword]3 damage[;] if it would|kill[;] instead heal for [heal]6|[gray](Even: To you[;] [gray]Odd: To opponent)
Script: On Execute: if (d % 2 == 0) {if (self.hp + getstatusself(SHIELD) <= 3) { attackself(-6); } else { attackself(3); }} else {if (target.hp + getstatus(SHIELD) <= 3) { attack(-6); } else { attack(3); }}

Name: Only in Death_upgraded
Description: Do [sword]<d6> damage[;] if it would|kill[;] instead heal for [heal]<double>|[gray](Even: To you[;] [gray]Odd: To opponent)
Script: On Execute: if (d % 2 == 0) {if (self.hp + getstatusself(SHIELD) <= 3) { attackself(-6); } else { attackself(3); }} else {if (target.hp + getstatus(SHIELD) <= 3) { attack(-6); } else { attack(3); }}

Name: Payback
Description: Do [sword]<var:damagetaken> damage|[gray](Equal to damage|[gray]taken this turn)
Script: Before Start Turn: self.setvar(~previoushp~|self.hp);  self.setvar(~damagetaken~|self.getvar(~previoushp~)-self.hp); if (self.hp < self.getvar(~previoushp~)) {self.setvar(~damagetaken~|self.getvar(~damagetaken~) + self.getvar(~previoushp~) - self.hp);} self.setvar(~previoushp~|self.hp);

Name: Bloody Blade
Description: Do [sword]2x<var:hitself> damage|[gray](For each time you hurt yourself)

Name: Sacrificial Dagger@1
Description: Do [sword]<d6> damage[;]|increases by [sword]1 if this|gets the killing blow
Script: On Execute: if (target.hp <= d) { giveequipment(~Sacrificial Dagger@2~|true|false|e); attack(d); } else { attack(d); }

Name: Sacrificial Dagger@2
Description: Do [sword]<d6> damage[;]|increases by [sword]1 if this|gets the killing blow
Script: On Execute: if (target.hp <= d) { giveequipment(~Sacrificial Dagger@3~|true|false|e); attack(d+1); } else { attack(d+1); }

Name: Sacrificial Dagger@3
Description: Do [sword]<d6> damage[;]|increases by [sword]1 if this|gets the killing blow
Script: On Execute: if (target.hp <= d) { giveequipment(~Sacrificial Dagger@4~|true|false|e); attack(d+2); } else { attack(d+2); }

Name: Sacrificial Dagger@4
Description: Do [sword]<d6> damage[;]|increases by [sword]1 if this|gets the killing blow
Script: On Execute: if (target.hp <= d) { giveequipment(~Sacrificial Dagger@5~|true|false|e); attack(d+3); } else { attack(d+3); }

Name: Sacrificial Dagger@5
Description: Do [sword]<d6> damage[;]|increases by [sword]1 if this|gets the killing blow
Script: On Execute: if (target.hp <= d) { giveequipment(~Sacrificial Dagger@6~|true|false|e); attack(d+4); } else { attack(d+4); }

Name: Sacrificial Dagger@6
Description: Do [sword]<d6> damage[;]|increases by [sword]1 if this|gets the killing blow
Script: On Execute: if (target.hp <= d) { giveequipment(~Sacrificial Dagger@7~|true|false|e); attack(d+5); } else { attack(d+5); }

Name: Sacrificial Dagger@7
Description: Do [sword]<d6> damage[;]|increases by [sword]1 if this|gets the killing blow
Script: On Execute: if (target.hp <= d) { giveequipment(~Sacrificial Dagger@8~|true|false|e); attack(d+6); } else { attack(d+6); }

Name: Sacrificial Dagger@8
Description: Do [sword]<d6> damage[;]|increases by [sword]1 if this|gets the killing blow
Script: On Execute: if (target.hp <= d) { giveequipment(~Sacrificial Dagger@9~|true|false|e); attack(d+7); } else { attack(d+7); }

Name: Sacrificial Dagger@9
Description: Do [sword]<d6> damage[;]|increases by [sword]1 if this|gets the killing blow
Script: On Execute: if (target.hp <= d) { giveequipment(~Sacrificial Dagger@10~|true|false|e); attack(d+8); } else { attack(d+8); }

Name: Sacrificial Dagger@10
Description: Do [sword]<d6> damage[;]|increases by [sword]1 if this|gets the killing blow

Name: No! Wait! Stop!
Description: Do [sword]1 damage <d6> times…|to YOURSELF!!!
Script: On Execute: var i = 0; for (i in 0...d) { pierceattackself(1); if (self.getvar(~hitself~) >= 0 && i > 0) { trace(~hitself~); self.setvar(~hitself~|self.getvar(~hitself~) + 1); } }

Name: Siphoning Battle Axe
Description: Do [sword]<triple> damage[;]|siphon <d6> of it back

Name: Chilled Blade
Description: Do [sword]<d6> damage|Next turn[;] freeze [ice]1

Name: Chilled Blade_upgraded
Description: Do [sword]<d6> damage|Next turn[;] freeze [ice]1

Name: Iceberg
Description: Freeze [ice]all dice[;]|next turn freeze|[ice]all of yours

Name: Gambit
Description: Insert a <d6>[;]|if you roll it next turn[;]|deal [sword]<triple> damage
Script: On Start Turn: var i = 0; for (i in 1...7) { for (mydice in self.dicepool) { trace(i); trace(getstatusself(~gambit_~+i)); if (mydice.available()) { trace(mydice.basevalue); if (mydice.basevalue == i) { if (getstatusself(~gambit_~+i) > 0) { target.textparticle(~It's a hit!~); attack(i * 3); sfxdamage(target|i * 3); removestatusself(~gambit_~+i|1); } } } } removestatusself(~gambit_~+i|ALL); }

Name: Spatulambit
Description: Insert a <d6>[;]|if you roll it flipped next|turn[;]deal [sword]<triple> damage
Script: On Start Turn: var i = 0; for (mydice in self.dicepool) { if (mydice.available()) { for (i in 1...7) { if (mydice.basevalue == getstatusself(~spatulambit_~+i)) { target.textparticle(~It's a hit!~); attack((7 - i) * 3); sfxdamage(target|(7 - i) * 3); removestatusself(~spatulambit_~+i|1); break; } } i = 0; } } self.setvar(~spatulambit~|0);
Script: End Turn: if (self.getvar(~spatulambit~) < 1) { var i = 0; for (i in 1...7) { removestatusself(~spatulambit_~+i|ALL); } }

Name: Spatulambit_upgraded
Description: Flip a <d6> and then insert it[;]|if you roll it next turn[;]|deal [sword]<triple> damage
Script: On Start Turn: var i = 0; for (mydice in self.dicepool) { if (mydice.available()) { for (i in 1...7) { if (mydice.basevalue == getstatusself(~gambit_~+i)) { target.textparticle(~It's a hit!~); attack(i * 3); sfxdamage(target|i * 3); removestatusself(~gambit_~+i|1); break; } } i = 0; } } self.setvar(gambit|0);
Script: End Turn: if (self.getvar(~gambit~) < 1) { var i = 0; for (i in 1...7) { removestatusself(~gambit_~+i|ALL); } }

Name: Rod of Roasting
Description: Cast Meteor repeatedly[;]|with random targets
Script: On Execute: while (self.hp > 0 && target.hp > 0) { if ( rand([1|2]) % 2 == 0 ) { trace(~Attacking me~); attackself(20| FIRE); inflictself(FIRE| ALL); sfxdamage(self|20); } else { trace(~Attacking enemy~); attack(20| FIRE); inflict(FIRE| ALL); sfxdamage(target|20); } }

Name: Throw Leftover Dice
Description: Do damage equal to|your unused dice|at the end of your turn

Name: Luck of the Draw
Description: Use 5 random equipments

Name: Hired Help
Description: Pay [gold]1 gold to deal <triple> damage|[gray](Only deals <d6> if you can't pay)

Name: Swung Too Hard
Description: Do <triple> damage[;]|disable 1 of your|equipment next turn
Script: On Start Turn: if (getstatusself(~smashed~) > 0) { for (i in 0...getstatusself(~smashed~)) { var equip = rand(self.equipment); while (equip.ready == 0) { trace(equip.name); equip = rand(self.equipment); } trace(equip.name); equip.animate(~error~); sfx(~roboterror~); } removestatusself(~smashed~|ALL); }

Name: Level Slash
Description: Do [sword]2x your|level damage

Name: Level Slash_upgraded
Description: Do [sword]2x your|level damage

Name: Stab Aggressively
Description: Do [sword]1 damage <d6> times

Name: A Metaphor for Racism
Description: Do [sword]<d6> damage[;]|[sword]<triple> damage if the enemy is a fish
Script: On Execute: trace(target.name); trace(self.name); if (target.name == ~Baby Squid~ # target.name == ~Kraken~) { attack(3*d); } else { attack(d); }

Name: Hacked!
Description: Lock [lock]2 dice[;]|shock [shock]2 equipment

Name: Reuseable Sword
Description: Do <d6> damage[;]|shuffle this back|into your deck

Name: Borrowed Sword
Description: Take control of an|enemy equipment[;]|shuffle it into your deck

Name: Righteous Vengeance
Description: You do [sword]1 extra damage|for the rest of the fight|[gray](Once per fight)

Name: Temporal Shift
Description: Your opponent takes an|extra turn[;] then you do
Script: On Execute: inflict(~bonus~); inflictself(~bonus~); //inflict lose a turn on myself to give opponent extra turn
Script: Before Start Turn: if (getstatus(~bonus~) > 0) { self.endturnnow(); removestatus(~bonus~|ALL); continue; } if (getstatusself(~bonus~) > 0) {inflictself(EXTRATURN|getstatusself(~bonus~)); removestatusself(~bonus~|ALL); e.availablethisturn = 0; } else { e.availablethisturn = 1; }

Name: Temporal Shift_upgraded
Description: All turns are doubled[;]|except for your first
Script: Before Start Turn: if (getstatus(~bonus~) > 0) { self.endturnnow(); removestatus(~bonus~|ALL); continue; } if (getstatusself(~bonus~) > 0) {inflictself(EXTRATURN|getstatusself(~bonus~)); removestatusself(~bonus~|ALL); }

Name: Blood Pact
Description: Damage dealt to you is also|dealt to your opponent
Script: On Execute: self.setvar(~previoushp~|self.hp); trace(~previoushp~); inflictself(~bloodpact~); giveequipment(~Necessary Inelegance~| true| false| e);

Name: Necessary Inelegance
Description: I didn't hope for this|to be so messy
Script: On any equipment use: trace(self.getvar(~previoushp~)); if (self.hp < self.getvar(~previoushp~)) { trace(~in here~); attack(self.getvar(~previoushp~) - self.hp); } self.setvar(~previoushp~|self.hp);

Name: Blood to Dice
Description: Your equipment costs|[heart]health instead of dice.

Name: Punch Really Really Hard
Description: Punch super hard[;]|fall asleep next turn
